thag1.7:1.1: He has cast aside the army of the King of Death,
thag1.7:1.2: as a fragile bridge of reeds by a great flood.
thag1.7:1.3: Victorious since his fears have vanished:
thag1.7:1.4: tame and steadfast, he has become quenched.
thag1.7:1.5: That is how this verse was recited by the senior venerable Bhalliya.
